name: Multi-Flow Visualization
description: Demonstrates flow-specific message assignment with shared messages and flow filtering
diagram:
sequenceDiagram
    title: Order Processing - Multi-Flow Visualization
    %%flow happy_path "Happy Path" #22C55E
    %%flow error_flow "Error Flow" #EF4444
    %%flow retry_flow "Retry Flow" #F59E0B

    participant Client
    participant API as API Gateway
    participant Payment
    participant DB as Database

    %% Shared message - belongs to all flows
    Client->>API: Submit Order @flow(happy_path, error_flow, retry_flow) @path(POST /orders)
    
    %% Shared message - belongs to happy and error flows
    API->>Payment: Process Payment @flow(happy_path, error_flow)
    
    %% Flow-specific success message
    Payment-->>API: Success @flow(happy_path)
    
    %% Flow-specific failure message
    Payment-->>API: Failed @flow(error_flow)
    
    %% Retry flow messages
    API->>Payment: Retry Payment @flow(retry_flow)
    Payment-->>API: Retry Success @flow(retry_flow)
    
    %% Happy path continues
    API->>DB: Save Order @flow(happy_path, retry_flow)
    DB-->>API: Order Saved @flow(happy_path, retry_flow)
    API-->>Client: Order Created @flow(happy_path, retry_flow)
    
    %% Error path ends
    API-->>Client: Order Failed @flow(error_flow)
